sentence: The  only  thing  left  at  Nova  now  are  portraits  and  photographs  of  hundreds  of  partygoers  who  were  murdered  here,  and  of  the  dozens  of  hostages  taken  from  here  to  Gaza,  mounted  on  stakes  in  the  desert  soil.
